features: Package includes: you will get 3 set hand brooms and dustpans for house cleaning in 3 different colors, namely pink, green and light blue, each broom is 14.5 cm/ 5.7 inches in length and 7.6 cm/ 3 inches in width, enough for your choice
Attentive design: this mini broom is designed in brush shape with a handle, which makes it easy to hold and sweep from above to reach in corners, with non-slip design, easy to grip and hang

Quality material: the whisk broom and dustpan adopt reliable PP plastic, odorless, safe and sturdy for daily use, the brush head is composed of 2 rows of soft hair that will not be harmful to surface, providing a long-lasting service for you

Convenient to store: this mini dust brush adopts a small loop design in the handles top, practical for hanging and storing, can be hung on wall, door and the hook, the dustpan will not drop down when the brush is hanging; They will not take up many spaces that you can place where you like

Widely applied: these colorful dust pans with brushes can handle small and large messes in your home, are suitable for trunk cleaning, keyboard cleaning, sofa cleaning, tea table cleaning and more, making your house clean and tidy
body.description: Features: Practical brooms: These whisk brush brooms allow you to apply in the classroom, office, bedroom, hotel, store, supermarket and more, which can bring you a fresh experience. Interesting for kids: These dust brushes cleaning tools in bright colors will attract your naughty little ones' attention. You can show them how to use it, they will be focused on them. Specifications: Material: PP plastic Color: pink, green light blue Size: 14.5 cm/ 5.7 inches in length, 7.6 cm/ 3 inches in width Package includes: 3 x Tiny dustpan and brush sets Notes: Manual measurement, please allow slight errors in size. The color may exist slight differences due to different screens.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small but mighty
reviews.reviewText: These little brooms are perfect! I use one for my baseboards and the others for cleaning my Guinea pigs cage. It’s tiny but sturdy and does the job!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Really small. Would be good for a desk top to get back behind the monitors. I had thought they were bigger. They are cute and do work.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Smaller than expected.
reviews.reviewText: The product is nice and still useful despite being smaller than expected. I am chalking that up to not paying attention. Dimensions of one broom/dustpan set approx 3.5x4 inches.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nothing amazing, but perfect for what I need.
reviews.reviewText: I purchased these to use in a little teardrop trailer to wipe pine-needles off a stainless steel counter. They work perfect for that, and are small, so I just hang one on the end of my paper towel holder. These are not high-quality brooms. The bristles are super soft and it won’t pick up pine needles on a wooden picnic table. If you need it to pick up heavier things…the bristles could be cut down to make them firmer. I tried this with one of the three and it worked better. The dustpan is nothing to write home about, but depending on your needs…it can work fine. I threw mine away, as I just sweep pine needles back into the dirt, and the brooms hang up without requiring the pan to be attached.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for cleaning my rat cage
reviews.reviewText: Bought these for easier clean up on my rat cage. Perfect size for it and makes my job easier!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Mini Dustpan & Brush
reviews.reviewText: These are great little brushes with soft bristles, perfect for dashes, vanities, keyboards, vents and more. The dustpans fit easily and securely. They make full contact with the surface so sweeping into them is easy. I put one in my car, one in may bathroom, and one in my cat’s travel bag. She travels with me and these are handy for any litter her litter mat doesn’t catch on hotel floors. Also, be warned if you have a cat, they may steal these brushes for facials. Mine will hold the brush in her paws and rub her face on the bristles.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A perfect mini Dustpan for our small RV & great price
reviews.reviewText: A perfect dustpan for our small RV. I am also keeping one for the worktable. The brushes aren't too stiff or too weak

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: absolutely love these! they are small and portable. we have one in the diaper bag for easy pick up when we are out to eat.
